main event: A metallic object, approximately 5-6 feet in diameter, was observed traveling at an estimated speed of 1000-1500 miles per hour at an altitude of around 65,000 feet over Pine Grove, California.
interesting points: The object was photographed using a high-altitude ballistic camera operating in the 2 1/2 inch spectrum.
The object maintained a steady course and velocity and showed no signs of an engine or propulsion system.
The object simply appeared and then disappeared from view, with no associated sound.
The sighting occurred on September 3, 1947 at 11:24 AM.
The witness had a keen interest in unidentified flying objects and had read extensively on the subject.
sighted object: a metallic object, approximately 5-6 feet in diameter
witnesses: a witness with a high-altitude ballistic camera
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph of the object
